languages.text: {n}Одолженные мысли покидают ваш разум. Вы знаете, что то, что они изрекли — правда. Они вернутся в последний раз, на перепутье судьбы, где вам предстоит сделать решающий выбор.{/n}

{n}Borrowed thoughts clear out of your mind. You know the things they spoke of are true. They will be back one last time at the crossroads of fate where you will have to make the choice that decides everything.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Одолженные мысли покидают ваш разум. Вы знаете, что то, что они изрекли — правда. Они вернутся в последний раз, на перепутье судьбы, где вам предстоит сделать решающий выбор.{/n}

{n}Borrowed thoughts clear out of your mind. You know the things they spoke of are true. They will be back one last time at the crossroads of fate where you will have to make the choice that decides everything.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那个声音从你脑海中消失了，你意识到它说的都是真的。接下来，你将最后一次面对命运的十字路口，为接下来的一切做出最终的选择。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Borrowed thoughts clear out of your mind. You know the things they spoke of are true. They will be back one last time at the crossroads of fate where you will have to make the choice that decides everything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那个声音从你脑海中消失了，你意识到它说的都是真的。接下来，你将最后一次面对命运的十字路口，为接下来的一切做出最终的选择。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Geborgte Gedanken verschwinden aus deinem Verstand. Du weißt, dass die Dinge, von denen sie gesprochen haben, wahr sind. Sie werden noch ein letztes Mal zurückkehren, an der Weggabelung des Schicksals, an der du die Wahl treffen musst, die über alles entscheidet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Borrowed thoughts clear out of your mind. You know the things they spoke of are true. They will be back one last time at the crossroads of fate where you will have to make the choice that decides everything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Geborgte Gedanken verschwinden aus deinem Verstand. Du weißt, dass die Dinge, von denen sie gesprochen haben, wahr sind. Sie werden noch ein letztes Mal zurückkehren, an der Weggabelung des Schicksals, an der du die Wahl treffen musst, die über alles entscheidet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los pensamientos ajenos se disipan de tu mente. Sabes que dicen la verdad. Volverán por última vez en la encrucijada del destino cuando debas tomar una decisión de la que dependerá todo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Borrowed thoughts clear out of your mind. You know the things they spoke of are true. They will be back one last time at the crossroads of fate where you will have to make the choice that decides everything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los pensamientos ajenos se disipan de tu mente. Sabes que dicen la verdad. Volverán por última vez en la encrucijada del destino cuando debas tomar una decisión de la que dependerá todo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ces pensées extérieures disparaissent de votre esprit. Vous savez qu'elles disaient vrai. Elles reviendront une dernière fois, à la croisée des destins, quand il vous faudra prendre la décision qui changera tout.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Borrowed thoughts clear out of your mind. You know the things they spoke of are true. They will be back one last time at the crossroads of fate where you will have to make the choice that decides everything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ces pensées extérieures disparaissent de votre esprit. Vous savez qu'elles disaient vrai. Elles reviendront une dernière fois, à la croisée des destins, quand il vous faudra prendre la décision qui changera tout.{/n}

languages.text: {n}借り物の考えが頭から消える。あなたは彼らが話していたことが真実だと知っている。彼らは、あなたがすべてを決める選択をしなければならない運命の岐路で、最後にもう一度戻ってくるだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Borrowed thoughts clear out of your mind. You know the things they spoke of are true. They will be back one last time at the crossroads of fate where you will have to make the choice that decides everything.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}借り物の考えが頭から消える。あなたは彼らが話していたことが真実だと知っている。彼らは、あなたがすべてを決める選択をしなければならない運命の岐路で、最後にもう一度戻ってくるだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sana ait olmayan düşünceler, zihnini terk ediyor. Doğruyu söylediğini biliyorsun. Her şeyin gidişatını belirleyecek seçimi yapman gereken o dönüm noktasına geldiğinde bir kez daha ortaya çıkacaklar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Borrowed thoughts clear out of your mind. You know the things they spoke of are true. They will be back one last time at the crossroads of fate where you will have to make the choice that decides everything.{/n}
